snippet.title: Interview with Naoto Maeda - Ace Combat Zero: The Belkan War
snippet.description:
An interview with Naoto Maeda, Director of Ace Combat Zero: The Belkan War. He previously worked on mission design for Ace Combat 3: Electrosphere.

English translation (available through captions) is mostly thanks to Cypronis from https://www.reddit.com/r/acecombat - any constructive comments on the translation are appreciated.

This interview was included on the Project Aces Trailer Collection, a DVD collection of interviews for Ace Combat Zero and trailers for Ace Combat 04, 5, and Zero. All rights to this video belong to Bandai Namco Entertainment; it has been uploaded here for archival and encyclopedic purposes.
